sentences.en: A hardfacing electrode containing boron and various alloy elements has been developed.

sentences.en: Borax is the compound commonly applied to the soil to correct boron deficiency.
sentences.cn: 硼砂是矫正土壤缺硼的常用硼化合物.

sentences.en: Boron carbon nitride ( BCN ) thin films were deposited by radio frequency ( RF ) magnetron sputtering .
sentences.cn: 采用射频 磁控溅射 技术制备出硼碳氮 ( BCN ) 薄膜.

sentences.en: Calmon has quoted ion exchange costs of $ 0.12 - 0 . 30 / 1000 gal for boron treatment.

sentences.en: High boron iron - based alloy ( HBIA ) is a kind of new wear - resistant material.
sentences.cn: 高硼铁 基合金 是一种新型 耐磨 材料.

sentences.en: Iron - nickel - phosphorus - boron quaternary alloy electroless plating on copper panel was described.
sentences.cn: 在铜基上化学镀铁 - 镍 - 磷 - 硼四元合金.

sentences.en: Magnetic cobalt - boron alloy deposits were prepared by electroless plating.
sentences.cn: 采用化学镀制得钴硼磁性合金镀层.

sentences.en: Only small amounts of wurtzite boron nitride and lonsdaleite exist naturally or have been made in the lab so until now no one had realised their superior strength.
sentences.cn: 天然存在或者实验室制造的纤锌矿型氮化硼和朗斯代尔石数量很少，直到现在，也没有一个人发现它们令人吃惊的硬度。

sentences.en: Phosphorus and boron act as glass flow temperature modifiers.
sentences.cn: 硼和磷作为玻璃流程温度修饰词.

sentences.en: So, we have beryllium in the first case here, it has four electrons, that's how we know it's beryllium, boron has five electrons.
sentences.cn: 那么我们将铍作为第一个例子，它有四个电子，这也是我们为什么能知道它是铍的原因，硼有五个电子。

sentences.en: Sodium, sulfate, magnesium, calcium, carbonate, bicarbonate, chloride, and boron should be determined in a water anylasis.

sentences.en: The phenomenon of boron particle ignition in hot air was defined.
sentences.cn: 说明了硼粒子在热空气中的点火现象.

sentences.en: The presence of boron or a boron compound in neutron shields has certain advantages.
sentences.cn: 在中子防护体中加入硼或一种硼的化合物是有一定优点的.

sentences.en: There is still great interest in boron as an essential plant nutrient.
sentences.cn: 迄今硼作为植物的必要营养元素仍极其重要.

sentences.en: Ways to further improve special boron bearing diamond are pointed out.
sentences.cn: 指出了进一步提高特殊类型含硼金刚石质量的方法与途径.

trans.tran_en: a very hard almost colourless crystalline metalloid element that in impure form exists as a brown amorphous powder. It occurs principally in borax and is used in hardening steel. The naturally occurring isotope boron-10 is used in nuclear control rods and neutron detection instruments. Symbol: B; atomic no: 5; atomic wt: 10.81; valency: 3; relative density: 2.34 (crystalline), 2.37 (amorphous); melting pt: 2092°C; boiling pt: 4002°C
